name: Secrets of Obninsk
description:
Secrets of Obninsk

Jump back to the 1950's and literally dive into the diary of security guard Zorkas Etorbachov! Reveal the secrets to find out why the nuclear power plant Obninsk exploded.

The Explosion - Awesome art by Jextech

Note: Playing in browser works, but downloading the game is recommended for best experience.

This Prototype of the game was made for the "Unity Create With Code" - GameJam 2020. Link

Every feedback is welcome, we would love to talk with you.

Enjoy!

By Leandro Graschi, Carlos Pozo and Josh Williams
